    • Method Detail

      • InitializeObservedValue

        public void InitializeObservedValue(int sampleSize,
                                    int numberOfTerms)
        Set the observed values. Per QTL for each sample the observed values are each term of the linear model. E.g. if the model is y = mono% + neut% + mono%:GT, the observedValues are [mono%, neut%, mono% * GT]

      • addObservedValue

        public void addObservedValue(double observedValue,
                             int sampleIndex,
                             int termIndex)

      • getObservedValues

        public double[][] getObservedValues()
                             throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Get the observed values. Per QTL for each sample the observed values are each term of the linear model. E.g. if the model is y = mono% + neut% + mono%:GT, the observedValues are [mono%, neut%, mono% * GT]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • addCelltypeVariablesIndex

        public void addCelltypeVariablesIndex(int[] values)
        Add the index of the celltype variables of the linear model e.g. the index of the celltype% and celltype%:GT of the model. If y = neut% + mono% + eos% + neut%:GT + eos%:GT celltypeTerms = [[0,3],[1],[2,4] This can be used to sum up the Beta * variable per cell type

      • getCelltypeVariablesIndex

        public java.util.List<int[]> getCelltypeVariablesIndex()
                                                throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Get the index of the celltype variables of the linear model e.g. the index of the celltype% and celltype%:GT of the model. If y = neut% + mono% + eos% + neut%:GT + eos%:GT celltypeTerms = [[0,3],[1],[2,4] This can be used to sum up the Beta * variable per cell type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • addIndependentVariableName

        public void addIndependentVariableName(java.lang.String independentVariables)
        Add the name of the independent variable name at the end of the existing list of independent variables.

      • getIndependentVariableNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIndependentVariableNames()
                                                             throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Get a list of the independent variables of the interaction model e.g. [neut%, mono%, neut%:GT]
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
